text: ‘Crisis’: The fallout from Trump’s surprise plan to close Kennedy Center - The Washington Post
fullText: The president’s announcement shocked artists and staff. A letter obtained by The Washington Post brought the National Symphony Orchestra’s future into focus.

text: U.S. and India seal trade deal after months of diplomatic tensions - The Washington Post
fullText: The United States and India finalized a trade agreement Monday, helping stabilize a relationship that had been in decline during Trump’s second term.

text: Here’s Mariners trade package for All-Star Brendan Donovan - The Seattle Times
fullText: The Mariners are finalizing a deal to acquire Cardinals' Brendan Donovan in a three-team deal involving the Tampa Bay Rays, sources told The Seattle Times.

text: China bans hidden car door handles over safety concerns - BBC
fullText: It makes China the first country to outlaw designs first popularised by Elon Musk's Tesla.

text: Asian Stocks Set to Climb After US Data Lifts Mood: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
fullText: Asian stocks climbed after their steepest two-day drop since April as markets found footing following sharp swings in gold and silver that sent ripples across assets. The precious metals rose in early trading.

text: A decade later, measles returns to Disneyland - SFGATE
fullText: Health officials warn the public about a child who visited Disneyland with measles while vaccination rates are below herd levels.

text: ‘Sherri’ Daytime Talk Show Canceled After Four Seasons - Variety
fullText: Sherri Shepherd's daytime talk show 'Sherri' has been canceled after four seasons.

text: Maryland House passes new congressional map, setting up a showdown with the state Senate - NBC News
fullText: The Maryland House approved legislation Monday to redraw the state’s congressional map, sending it to the state Senate, where its future is uncertain.

text: Avisail Garcia Announces Retirement - MLB Trade Rumors
fullText: Former All-Star Avisail Garcia is hanging up his spikes after 11 years in the major leagues. MLBTR looks back on his career.

text: Trump says DOJ should continue Fed Chair Powell probe 'to the end' - CNBC
fullText: Sen. Thom Tillis said he would oppose any new Fed nominees until the Powell probe is resolved, the same day Trump announced Kevin Warsh as his Fed chair pick.

text: Nicki Minaj Says It Was the ‘Bullying’ President Trump Faced, Not His Policies, That Made Her Step Into Politics - Yahoo
fullText: The rapper explained that she felt she could relate to the way the president "was being treated."

text: Spoiler: Closing for February 2 WWE RAW Revealed - Ringside News
fullText: Roman Reigns will reportedly close out tonight’s episode of Monday Night RAW, just days after winning the 2026 Men’s Royal Rumble. According to

text: Six teams leave regional sports network Main Street to join MLB - ESPN
fullText: Six teams officially left their regional sports network, Main Street Sports, and joined Major League Baseball on Monday, essentially shedding their local-media contracts.

text: Populist conservative Laura Fernández wins Costa Rica's presidential election - NPR
fullText: Candidate Laura Fernández won a resounding victory, promising to continue the aggressive reorienting of the Central American nation's politics started by her predecessor.

text: Adobe Animate is shutting down as company focuses on AI - TechCrunch
fullText: Adobe Animate will be discontinued on March 1, 2026, as Adobe shifts its focus to AI.

text: What Jared Kushner's 'New Gaza' plan includes, and what it leaves out - NPR
fullText: President Trump's son-in-law Jared Kushner laid out a plan for a "New Gaza." A close look suggests it makes room for fewer Palestinians and less housing.

text: The Trump Administration exempts new nuclear reactors from environmental review - NPR
fullText: The announcement comes just days after NPR revealed the administration had secretly rewritten safety and environmental standards.

text: Firefox is adding a switch to turn AI features off - The Verge
fullText: Mozilla is launching a new option that will allow you to turn off AI-powered features inside Firefox, including abuilt-in chatbot, AI translations, AI tab groups, and more.

text: NASA's IMAP Active Link for Real-Time Data now Available - Space Weather Prediction Center (.gov)
New iPhone Fold specs revealed, including design, cameras, more - 9to5Mac
fullText: New details have been shared by another leaker on several aspects of the iPhone Fold’s design, features, and more
